Avoid crab. It's not local and it's not fresh (and because of that, you'll have to seek it out). If you want to splurge, go with lobster. Your best bet is probably fried clams. One great place (historic, fabulous view across the harbor) is http://www.sullivanscastleisland.com/. It's not really near the North End, though. You could take the Red Line to JFK and take a hubway bike from there.

What always strikes me is that quality teabags like Numi, which are made from loose leaf teas, are always hugely overpriced - you pay for 12 or 20 bags the same price that you would pay for 100 or 200 cups of loose tea.
That said, I drink a lot of tea from bags at work, and I like Taylor's of Harrogate, particularly their Earl Grey.

If you're going to be in Cambridge, Cambridge Savings Bank is non-sucky and lends its money in the community. If you're going to affiliated with the World's Greatest University, there's a Harvard University Employee Credit Union.

Saying your favorites are green and black is a bit like saying your favorite wine is "red". There's a huge variety of different green and black teas.
My favorite black teas are Assam and Keemun. Both are a good brisk morning tea. Even within those categories there are a bazillion choices. I drink them with milk and sweetener. But there are other teas, like a nice Orange Spice, that I just drink with sweetener.
My recommendation: go to http://uptontea.com and order their catalog. Then go through and order a bunch of their 10-cup sample packets for a buck or two, and see what you like.

Unless you have a huge driveway, I'd say shovel through the whole winter to see how much work it is. You won't fully appreciate the snowblower until you've shovelled.
BTW, I have a simple crappy electric one, and it works fine for my substantial driveway. But I'm really not sure it's any faster.
How about not copying a whole blog post into a Reddit thread? You did give a link, but IMHO you stole too much content.
And just so you know, Brighton isn't an actual city. Boston is your city and supplies you with everything civic.
